steps.plaintext: Collect all Stone of Remembrance (obtained by making offerings to Statues of The Seven in Liyue)
steps.markdown: Collect all ◀Stone of Remembrance▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stone_of_Remembrance▷ (obtained by making offerings to ◀Statues of The Seven▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Statues_of_The_Seven▷ in ◀Liyue▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Liyue▷)

steps.plaintext: Climb each of the pillars and insert the stone
steps.markdown: Climb each of the pillars and insert the stone

substeps.plaintext: Collect the exquisite chest that spawns after inlaying each Stone of Remembrance.
substeps.markdown: Collect the exquisite chest that spawns after inlaying each ◀Stone of Remembrance▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stone_of_Remembrance▷.

substeps.plaintext: Some pillars are guarded by enemies.
substeps.markdown: Some pillars are guarded by enemies.

substeps.plaintext: The fight does not start until you approach the inactive Ruin Guard in the center of the ruins. You can kill the spiders at the edges of the room before activating the Ruin Guard for an easier time.
substeps.markdown: The fight does not start until you approach the inactive Ruin Guard in the center of the ruins. You can kill the spiders at the edges of the room before activating the Ruin Guard for an easier time.

substeps.plaintext: Pyro Infusion Stones will spawn periodically during the fight. They will buff the enemies considerably but they can be destroyed to remove the buff (although sometimes it may be bugged where they cannot be destroyed; logging out and into the game resolves the bug).
substeps.markdown: Pyro ◀Infusion Stones▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Infusion_Stone▷ will spawn periodically during the fight. They will buff the enemies considerably but they can be destroyed to remove the buff (although sometimes it may be bugged where they cannot be destroyed; logging out and into the game resolves the bug).

substeps.plaintext: There will be 3 waves of enemies:
substeps.markdown: There will be 3 waves of enemies:

substeps.plaintext: The room in the back will have 1 Luxurious Chest, 1 Precious Chest, and 1 Royal Flora (5 Star)
substeps.markdown: The room in the back will have 1 Luxurious ◀Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chest▷, 1 Precious Chest, and 1 ◀Royal Flora▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Noblesse_Oblige▷ (5 Star)

steps.plaintext: Fetch a good price for the Dull Ring
steps.markdown: Fetch a good price for the ◀Dull Ring▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dull_Ring▷

substeps.plaintext: Talk to Bolai at Liyue Harbor
You can choose to sell the ring for 180,000 Mora + 5 Adeptus' Temptation.
substeps.markdown: You can choose to sell the ring for 180,000 Mora + 5 ◀Adeptus' Temptation▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Adeptus%27_Temptation▷.

substeps.plaintext: You can choose to sell the ring for 200,000 Mora.
substeps.markdown: You can choose to sell the ring for 200,000 Mora.
